text: 7:58 Godɨn Araziba 13:9; Luk 4:29; Aposel 6:13-14; 22:20; Hibru 13:12Egha me a kurugha nguibar ekiamɨn azenan ghugha, maghɨrama dagɨabar a ginifi. Egha akam a gasir darazi uan azenan azuir korotiaba suegha gumazir igiam, an ziam Solɨn dagarimningɨn a da arɨsi.7:58 Moses Osirizir Araziba ghaze, gumazitam arazir kuram damightɨ, me a inigh nguibamɨn azenan mangɨ dagɨaba isɨ a ginivightɨ, an aremegham. Nɨ Ofa Gami 24:13-16, ko Dɨboboniba 15:35ɨn gan.
